title: Always stuck on Waiting for Stats??
body: At the end of every game, the post game lobby always seems to be stuck on "waiting for stats". The weird part is, it seems to be my router, because once I connect to my dorm wifi, the post game lobby would show up as expected. Any help would be appreciated

replies.body:
It sounds like you should look at factory resetting the router or replacing it, since you've nailed it down to just that device.

Let me know if you have any further questions.
